channel.title: Does anyone
channel.description: have a script or something to create a new character with? i cbf to manually put in every field

item.title: Does anyone
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:12, topic:421623”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=524279.msg3816219#msg3816219 date=1321375387]

[quote author=vortex link=topic=524279.msg3816140#msg3816140 date=1321365023]
Here’s an idea for you CFF: update the sql file with a temp acc
[/quote]No one is stopping anyone from doing that…
[/quote]You already have a database with a character or two[/quote]My structure is different ATM, so it would be useless for you at this particular moment.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:6, topic:421623”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=524279.msg3815547#msg3815547 date=1321308213]
Find a register script, note what it adds to the database and then just make a loop. Not too difficult
[/quote]Why would he make a loop?[/quote]Misread the post. I thought he was asking for multiple character generating :P. Nevermind then.

item.title: Does anyone
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:3, topic:421623”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=524279.msg3815317#msg3815317 date=1321292676]

[quote author=vortex link=topic=524279.msg3815276#msg3815276 date=1321286807]
have a script or something to create a new character with? i cbf to manually put in every field
[/quote]I thought there were a few characters already in the Database.sql file.
[/quote]nope

INSERT INTO pk_players (user, username, owner, pass, creation_date, creation_ip) VALUES ('2094917', 'admin', '1', '21232f297a57a5a743894a0e4a801fc3', 10, '0.0.0.0');
tried both name and hash for both user and username but neither worked[/quote]You need to add them to other tables as well…

Also, look at the auth package in the LS.

Read full topic
